localised_description.last_approved_text: Their leader banished them, leaving them humiliated and outraged!

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: Their leader banished them, leaving them humiliated and outraged!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Their captors released them, filling them with relief and gratitude!

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: Their captors released them, filling them with relief and gratitude!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following their release, their captors-turned-masters employed them. Naturally, they were happy at this turn of events!

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: Following their release, their captors-turned-masters employed them. Naturally, they were happy at this turn of events!

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are pleased by the plight of their friend, whose captors released then employed them!

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: They are pleased by the plight of their friend, whose captors released then employed them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are outraged and grief-stricken by the fate of their friend, whose captors chose to execute them!

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: They are outraged and grief-stricken by the fate of their friend, whose captors chose to execute them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are delighted and relieved by the fate of their friend, whose captors chose to release them!

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: They are delighted and relieved by the fate of their friend, whose captors chose to release them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are thrilled by the fate of a most-hated nemesis, whose masters had them executed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are outraged to learn the fate of a most-hated nemesis, whose captors released them.

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: They are outraged to learn the fate of a most-hated nemesis, whose captors released them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They have long held this faction in the highest regard.

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: They have long held this faction in the highest regard.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Their hatred for this faction is deep-seated.

past_experience_reasons.localised_description: Their hatred for this faction is deep-seated.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are greatly displeased that they now must share a faction with a bitter rival, who was employed following their release.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They were greatly thrilled to learn of a bitter rival's execution.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are infuriated at having to stand by as a hated rival was released.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are heartbroken by the death of a most-loved sworn brother, whose master had them executed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are beyond relieved at the release of their sworn brother.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They are greatly aggrieved by the confederation of their faction and the signing away of its freedom.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Their faction was destroyed, and now they are left with a new master and hatred towards their destroyer.
